page.title: 02Local Employment
page.content: Most people in{Sigglesthorne work in jobs which are connected with {farming.}Some people travel from the area to Hull, to Hornsea and to Beverley to work. All the local jobs are on local farms or at the gravel pits. A typical farm will employ one more man all the year round and take on extra labour or contractors at busy times. Twenty drivers work from the gravel pits. For all other forms of{employment people have to travel out of the village. These jobs include a M.P., builders, joiners, shopkeepers, doctor, garage mechanics, policemen, hairdressers, optician. Our School employs two teachers and two part time teachers. Five other part time jobs are provided by the school.Some women have part time jobs such as cleaning or shopwork.
